directed by [http://www.toddlincoln.com Todd Lincoln]*[http://www.andybodeanandthebottomboys.com/mp3/2004_sloweducation.wmv Slow Education]* [http://www.andybodeanandthebottomboys.com/mp3/2004_neworleans.wmv New Orleans (Live)]* [http://www.andybodeanandthebottomboys.com/mp3/2004_rebeljew.wmv Rebel Jew (Outtake)]* [http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u-E8jLX4v-0 Wild Palms]* [http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eUpJNWNp1gI Horseleg Swastikas] - Early Times

title: Contact
body: For Silver Jews booking enquiries, please email::derek@satellitebooking.comFor other Silver Jews press enquiries, please email::press@dragcity.comWrite to the Silver Jews at::Silver Jews:P.O. Box 160009:Nashville, TN 37216Write to the Corduroy Suit at::Mutlow Lodge:Wendens Ambo:Saffron Walden:CB11 4JL:UKEmail the Corduroy Suit at: :tom ''at'' weeblackskelf ''dot'' co ''dot'' uk

title: Audio
body: Here are a selection of songs from various Silver Jews records and elsewhere. To listen to any of these, it is best to right-click on the song name and select "Save link as..." (or similar) to download the whole song.== Album Tracks ==* [http://www.weeblackskelf.co.uk/cordsuit/audio/songs/roomgamesanddiamondrain.mp3 Room Games and Diamond Rain] - from Bright Flight* [http://www.weeblackskelf.co.uk/cordsuit/audio/songs/people.mp3 People] - from American Water* [http://www.weeblackskelf.co.uk/cordsuit/audio/songs/blackandbrownblues.mp3 Black and Brown Blues] - from The Natural Bridge== Cover Versions ==* [http://www.weeblackskelf.co.uk/cordsuit/audio/covers/pastels-advicetothegraduate.mp3 Advice To The Graduate] - covered by the Pastels== Poetry Readings ==* [http://www.weeblackskelf.co.uk/cordsuit/audio/poems/theimpossibleshapes.mp3 David Berman reading with The Impossible Shapes]* [http://www.weeblackskelf.co.uk/cordsuit/audio/poems/governorsonsominex.mp3 Governors on Sominex]* [http://www.weeblackskelf.co.uk/cordsuit/audio/poems/mylifeathomeduringbankinghours.mp3 My Life at Home During Banking Hours]
